languages.text: "Я слышу это от вас — слуги Императора, поправшего все святое? Того, для кого, судя по всему, законы Империума — пустой звук?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Махарий кривится то ли в улыбке, то ли в отвращении. Искусственная кожа на его лице неприглядно топорщится.{/n} "Я слышу это от вас — слуги Императора, поправшего все святое? Того, для кого, судя по всему, законы Империума — пустой звук?"
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: "I am hearing this from you, the Emperor's servant who flouts all that is sacred? The person who seems to think the laws of the Imperium are meaningless?"
languages.original_text: "Я слышу это от вас — слуги Императора, поправшего все святое? Того, для кого, судя по всему, законы Империума — пустой звук?"

traits.locale_text: "I am hearing this from you — the Emperor's servant who scorns at everything sacred? The one for whom the laws of the Imperium sound like empty words?"
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: "I am hearing this from you — the Emperor's servant who scorns at everything sacred? The one for whom the laws of the Imperium sound like empty words?"
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: "I am hearing this from you, the Emperor's servant who flouted all sanctity? The one for whom the laws of the Imperium are apparently laughing stock?"
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: "I am hearing this from you, the Emperor's servant who flouted all sanctity? The one for whom the laws of the Imperium are apparently laughing stock?"
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: "I am hearing this from you, the Emperor's servant who flouts all that is sacred? The person who seems to think the laws of the Imperium are meaningless?"
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: "I am hearing this from you, the Emperor's servant who flouts all that is sacred? The person who seems to think the laws of the Imperium are meaningless?"
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: 「あらゆる神聖なものに背く、皇帝の従者たるあなたがそのようなことを言うのですか？帝国法を無意味だと考えているような人物が？」
languages.original_text: "I am hearing this from you, the Emperor's servant who flouts all that is sacred? The person who seems to think the laws of the Imperium are meaningless?"

traits.locale_text: 「あらゆる神聖なものに背く、皇帝の従者たるあなたがそのようなことを言うのですか？帝国法を無意味だと考えているような人物が？」
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: “这话竟然是从您嘴里说出来的？藐视一切神圣事务的帝皇忠仆？将帝国法律视作笑柄的行商浪人？”
languages.original_text: "I am hearing this from you, the Emperor's servant who flouts all that is sacred? The person who seems to think the laws of the Imperium are meaningless?"

traits.locale_text: “这话竟然是从您嘴里说出来的？藐视一切神圣事务的帝皇忠仆？将帝国法律视作笑柄的行商浪人？”
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: « Quelle ironie venant de la part d'{mf|un serviteur|une servante} de l'Empereur qui bafoue tout ce que nous avons de plus sacré et qui se moque des lois de l'Imperium comme d'une guigne ! »
languages.original_text: "I am hearing this from you, the Emperor's servant who flouts all that is sacred? The person who seems to think the laws of the Imperium are meaningless?"

traits.locale_text: « Quelle ironie venant de la part d'{mf|un serviteur|une servante} de l'Empereur qui bafoue tout ce que nous avons de plus sacré et qui se moque des lois de l'Imperium comme d'une guigne ! »
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: «¿Y eso me lo dice un{mf||a} sirviente del Emperador que se burla de todas sus leyes? ¿La persona que parece pensar que las leyes del Imperium son un sinsentido?».
languages.original_text: "I am hearing this from you, the Emperor's servant who flouts all that is sacred? The person who seems to think the laws of the Imperium are meaningless?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y eso me lo dice un{mf||a} sirviente del Emperador que se burla de todas sus leyes? ¿La persona que parece pensar que las leyes del Imperium son un sinsentido?».
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: "Das höre ich von Euch, dem Diener des Imperators, der alles, was heilig ist, verspottet? Der Person, die zu denken scheint, die Gesetze des Imperiums wären bedeutungslos?"
languages.original_text: "I am hearing this from you, the Emperor's servant who flouts all that is sacred? The person who seems to think the laws of the Imperium are meaningless?"

traits.locale_text: "Das höre ich von Euch, dem Diener des Imperators, der jede Heiligkeit verspottet? Der über die Gesetze des Imperiums offenbar nur lachen kann?"
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: "Doğru mu duyuyorum? İmparator'un kutsal tanımaz hizmetkârı mı söylüyor bunları? İmparatorluk'un yasalarını hiçe sayan şahıs mı?"
languages.original_text: "I am hearing this from you, the Emperor's servant who flouts all that is sacred? The person who seems to think the laws of the Imperium are meaningless?"

traits.locale_text: "Doğru mu duyuyorum? İmparator'un kutsal tanımaz hizmetkârı mı söylüyor bunları? İmparatorluk'un yasalarını hiçe sayan şahıs mı?"
traits.speaker: Zaurback
